comment._content: In February 1916, he was president-elect of Switzerland. See The Tomahawk., February 03, 1916, page 4 (top left, includes photo) chroniclingamerica.loc.gov/lccn/sn89064695/1916-02-03/ed-... en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Camille_Decoppet
